name: order-tracking.toml

description.summary: Track order status using phone number

rawContent:
# Order Tracking Route
# Track order status by phone

[route]
id = "order-tracking"
path = "/prototype/client/track"
title = "Track Order"

[page]
type = "public"
role = "client"

[page.description]
summary = "Track order status using phone number"
features = [
  "Phone verification",
  "Order status display",
  "Assigned specialist info",
  "Timeline of status changes"
]

[relations]
guards = ["public"]
roles = ["client"]
entities = ["order", "specialist"]
platforms = ["client-app"]

[implementation]
component = "OrderTracking"
file = "src/prototype/pages/client/OrderTracking.tsx"
status = "planned"
